alert.note: Alert for Natchitoches (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 26 at 4:55PM CDT until March 26 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM CDT FOR WEST CENTRAL NATCHITOCHES PARISH... At 455 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles southwest of Natchitoches, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Natchitoches, Provencal, Natchez, Robeline, Cloutierville, Melrose, Flora, Cypress, Bermuda and St. Maurice. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CDT for north central and northwestern Louisiana. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
